attributes.action: Ensure that rights to a trial by a jury of your peers remains intact.
attributes.additional_details: The foundation of any democratic judicial system is the right to a trial by a jury of your peers, parliament needs to carefully scrutinise the proposals by government to end this right.
attributes.background: We the British public, do not consent to the scrapping of jury trials. A trial by a jury of your peers is the foundation of a just judicial system and we must uphold this tradition.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do not remove trial by jury for certain cases
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751480
